hero.title: [In This Economy] How Marcos Jr. bastardized the national budget
hero.description: In a way, things are worse now. Pork didn’t go away; it just morphed into something else that’s more hidden now and is more prone to patronage than ever before.

primary.lead: Mary Jane Veloso's Transfer to the Philippines
primary.title: Philippines and Indonesia reach deal to return Filipina death row convict
primary.description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. says Mary Jane Veloso to come home after ‘long and difficult journey’.

secondary.title: From death row to life term: Mary Jane Veloso gets reduced sentence
secondary.description: Marcos said that Indonesia has lowered Veloso’s sentence from the death penalty to life imprisonment.

secondary.title: News of impending return raises hopes for Mary Jane Veloso’s mother - Manila Standard
secondary.description: Celia Veloso, the mother of overseas Filipino worker (OFW) Mary Jane Veloso thanked everyone working to bring her daughter back to the Philippines

secondary.title: Mary Jane Veloso ‘elated’ to be coming home
secondary.description: "I am very elated to hear there is an opening chance for my hope to return home and be with my family," Mary Jane Veloso said in a written statement read by the prison warden Evi Loliancy on Thursday.

carousel.title: 12 reported dead due to typhoons Nika, Ofel, Pepito: NDRRMC | ABS-CBN News
carousel.description: A total of 12 people have been reported dead due to typhoons Nika, Ofel, and Pepito that overlapped with each other in a span of weeks, the National Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Council (NDRRMC) said on Thursday.

carousel.title: House probe: OVP, DepEd CFs received by same man, different signatures
carousel.description: Manila, Philippines — Offices under Vice President Sara Duterte are facing another issue as the same person received two different acknowledgment receipts (ARs) for confidential fund

carousel.title: Sara Duterte publicly threatens to have President Marcos assassinated
carousel.description: Philippine Vice President Sara Duterte said Saturday, November 23, 2024, she has contracted an assassin to kill the President, his wife and the House of Representative

carousel.title: Break cycle of poverty for good; prioritize livelihood over ‘ayuda’
carousel.description: A considerable portion of the national budget is allocated to cash assistance programs or what is now popularly known as “ayuda.”
